name: Erza Scarlet (Fairy Tail) LoRA
description:
Erza Scarlet is an armored mage from the fairy tail anime.

This lora was trained on 2000 steps , 20 epochs and 195 images.

Produces very good results with the tags: erza scarlet, fairy tail, red hair, brown eyes.

Suggested weights: 0.4-0.8

Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui\models\Lora

meta.prompt: 1girl, solo, erza scarlet, fairy tail, red hair, brown eyes, long hair, looking at viewer, serious, close-up, closed mouth, sidelocks, armor, upper body,  <lora:erza:0.7><hypernet:sgqo1n:1.0>
